memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const float *alpha, const float *A, rocblas_int lda, const float *x, rocblas_int incx, const float *beta, float *y, rocblas_int incy)
memberdef.name: rocblas_sgemv

detaileddescription.para: xGEMV performs one of the matrix-vector operations y := alpha*A*x + beta*y, or y := alpha*A**T*x + beta*y, or y := alpha*A**H*x + beta*y,
where alpha and beta are scalars, x and y are vectors and A is an m by n matrix.

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
pointer storing matrix A on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the leading dimension of A.
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
specifies the increment for the elements of x.
pointer storing vector y on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_operation transA, rocblas_int m, rocblas_int n, const double *alpha, const double *A, rocblas_int lda, const double *x, rocblas_int incx, const double *beta, double *y, rocblas_int incy)
memberdef.name: rocblas_dgemv
